Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Blue and Little Rainbow Riding Hood - Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep925
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Game Over/Forever Young - Kai invents a new Virtual Reality training game, but Stu and Safia enter the game and want to be the winners! // The Deer Squad must help the city's residents when they break out in spots thanks to Sir Steel's new face cream.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lighthouse - The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Doctor Chipper - Bossy Turtle and Roller helps Chipper face her fear of going to the doctor's.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Busy Buddies - Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island / The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it. // When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The Ocelot's Tale - A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep514
programme.desc: Kylie Kangeroo - Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep515
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Dog - Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep923

programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep403
programme.desc: Blue's Wish Comes True! - Blue finds a fairy wand that can grant everyone their biggest wish-all we need is the magic word! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the magic word, we go on a magical chase through the Wishing Woods and meet the Dandelion Fairy!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Tiny Heroes/Big Face in Space - When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep217
programme.desc: The Secret Room / Little Shrimp, Big Problems - Pepito traps our Pirate Protectors inside a secret room in El Escondite that they can only escape from by working together. // The grand opening of Martn's paleta shop is almost ruined when a mysterious creature begins wreaking havoc in Merlandia.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Doctor Chipper - Bossy Turtle and Roller helps Chipper face her fear of going to the doctor's.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Birthdaze - Bossy comes up with a plan to celebrate his birthday every day.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Space Invader - After a long day of adventures together, Turtle needs space from Bossy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox / Pups Save a Mayor on a Wire - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records. // A hungry eagle causes Mayor Goodway's tightrope walking lesson to go awry sending her careening down Jake's Mountain

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep516
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park - To celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday, the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddy's birthday treat.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep518
programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lighthouse - The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: Ib the Dog S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Ib gets caught in the wind - Ib needs to get a haircut, but when he leaves the house he's met by a very strong wind. Ib can hardly make it to the end of the garden before he realizes changing hairstyle might be harder than he thinks...

programme.title: Ib the Dog S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Ib and Poodle try to sit still - Ib is out for a walk. Jenny F is trying to take a picture of the poodle, but it will not sit still. When Ib tries to help, he soon finds out sitting still is harder than it looks...

programme.title: Ib the Dog S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Ib and Mouse play with Facepaints - Ib uses facepaint to draw a scar on his cheek. When Mouse sees Ib in his new disguise he doesn't recognise him, so Ib shows Mouse all the ways you can play with facepaint.

programme.title: Ib the Dog S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Ib and Mouse read a book - Ib wants to read a thick book to Mouse, but Mouse doesn't understand the words in the book. As they keep reading and playing, Ib and Mouse soon realise they understand the book after all!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Squid N' Playl - Bossy and Turtle invite Saddiq to take part in International Bestie Day traditions.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Board to Tears - When Turtle gets a new skateboard, he's too scared to use it when Bossy has an accident.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Roll With It - Bossy gets a new board game and forces his friends to keep playing.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme / Sea Cow - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko. // The crew must stop Bonnie Bones' latest quest for treasure when she disrupts a manatee habitat with a sticky invention.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Kiko's Song - When the coqus of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lighthouse - The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep405
programme.desc: Firefighter Blue to the Rescue! - Josh and Blue suit up to be firefighter helpers for the day! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help the firefighters, we train for duty at the fire house, learn about fire safety, and ride Fiery Truck on a special rescue mission!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Wheel of Steel/Bobbi's Bongos - Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would! // Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games / The Golden Guitar - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure. // Toms breaks his guitar while trying to retrieve the golden guitar of his idol and learns that music comes from within.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep113
programme.desc: King - In Teletubbyland, Dipsy is King. Tinky Winky delivers Tubby Custard and Tubby Toast to King Dipsy - whatever King Dipsy wants! Luckily for Tinky Winky they soon swap places.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Beans - Dee encourages a friend to say beans and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep7
programme.desc: A Band for the Stand - Helping Hand builds a bandstand, so Mae-Mae decides to form a band with her friends.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Me and My Shadow - When Messy breaks the lighthouse, things get shady. But without a shadow of a doubt, he and his friends save the day!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Ugli Fruit - Monty and Stan refuse to taste a strange-looking fruit, but Monty soon realises that you shouldn't judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep23
programme.desc: The Choir Badge - The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep22
programme.desc: The Feelings Badge - The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep21
programme.desc: The Days of the Week Badge - After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Jigokudani Monkey Park, Japan - The Go Jetters fly to the rescue in Japan, as Glitch gets up to his usual monkey business.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Blue Mountains, Jamaica - Trouble brews in Jamaica when Glitch's campfire threatens a coffee plantation.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Easter - It's the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Christmas Swim - The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Andy and the Grizzly Bear - When some new grizzly bears arrive at the park during a hot summer, it's up to Andy to make sure they have everything they need to help them get rid of their winter coats.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Amphibious Machines - Grace goes for a ride on a quad bike that turns into a jet ski, shows off a vehicle that floats using its wheels and then drives a pond weed cutter!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep5
programme.desc: Bowled Over - Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep52
programme.desc: The Story Badge - The squirrels do everything at the clubhouse, from reading and drawing, to running and dancing, and tire themselves out, so Duggee suggests they have a break with a story.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep50
programme.desc: The Surprise Badge - The squirrels and Duggee buy Hennie a surprise present for her birthday - but first they need to wrap it up.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Bioluminescent Bay, Puerto Rico - Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.desc: Percy and the Calliope - Percy tries to fix an old calliope so that it isn't scrapped.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Frosted In - Nelly and Nora figure out how to walk around without slipping on icy patches.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Dad Dancing - Stan doesn't want to dance because he's not good at it, leaving Monty wondering whether you have to be good at things to enjoy them.

programme.desc: It's time to find a dinosaur - After playing with her toy dinosaurs, JoJo decides she would love to see a real one. Gran Gran takes JoJo to the museum to see a fossilised skeleton of a Tyrannosaurus rex!

programme.desc: Pipe Down! - Jo's Dad can't fit his truck through a tunnel. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Almeida vs. Lewis
programme.desc: Main Event - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Champs Only - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2335
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 OR Thailand Grand Prix Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2335
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and UFC vet Leon Rocky Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
